title: NSA Technician
desc:
Post 39
***Parabolic Microphone** (1x, Charge 60%)*
Receive 16 minus (100 - your score, divided by 10, rounded to the nearest whole number) random messages your target sends to Hello Neighbor or Factional chats, or receives from the host.
***PRISM** (Passive)*
Triggered the first time you place in the top 3. Learn all of the factional chats which currently have at least one alive player.
***Infiltrate Network** (2x, Locked)*
Unlocked when you place in the top 3. Select a factional chat and receive the 16 minus (100 - your score, divided by 10, rounded to the nearest whole number) most recent messages, at least 10 characters in length, from that chat.
